features: Efficient multibase conversions using Horner's Method
Real-time expression evaluation and process tracing
Asynchronous calculation engine via Web Workers API
Premium dynamic UI with base-responsive aesthetic themes
en.description: A state-of-the-art mathematical workstation for desktop platforms, designed for architectural elegance and educational clarity. Built on the Electron framework, it features a non-blocking calculation engine powered by Web Workers to handle high-precision multibase arithmetic and expression tracing without UI lag. The application delivers a premium Glassmorphism aesthetic with themes that adapt to the selected numerical base, bridging the gap between a high-efficiency power tool and a sophisticated educational platform.

es.description: Una estación de trabajo matemática de vanguardia para escritorio, diseñada para la elegancia arquitectónica y la claridad educativa. Basada en el framework Electron, cuenta con un motor de cálculo no bloqueante potenciado por Web Workers para manejar aritmética multibase de alta precisión. La aplicación ofrece una estética premium de Glásmorfismo con temas que se adaptan a la base numérica seleccionada, uniendo una herramienta de alta eficiencia con una plataforma educativa sofisticada.
